SELECT d.course_id,d.course_name,d.begin_date, d.duration,d.grade,d.section,d.subject,d.term,d.week,d.user_name, u.user_id,u.username, s.school_id,s.school_name, GROUP_CONCAT(s.school_id) schoolIds, GROUP_CONCAT(s.school_name) schoolNames, c.class_id,c.class_name, cr.id classroom_id,cr.location,cr.state,cr.url FROM jcc_school_timetable d LEFT JOIN jcc_timetable_relate_school jtrs ON (d.course_id = jtrs.course_id) LEFT JOIN jcc_school_info s ON (s.school_id = jtrs.school_id) LEFT JOIN jcc_class_info c ON (c.class_id = d.class_id) LEFT JOIN jcc_classroom_info cr ON (cr.id = d.classroom_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u ON (u.user_id = d.user_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND d.course_name like CONCAT('%','${schoolTimetable.courseName}','%')
AND s.subject like CONCAT('%','${schoolTimetable.subject}','%')
AND s.school_name like CONCAT('%','${schoolTimetable.schoo lName}','%')
AND s.school_id = #{schoolTimetable.schoolId}
AND s.school_id in (#{schoolTimetable.schoolIds})
AND d.week = #{schoolTimetable.week}
GROUP BY d.course_id
mapper.select: select belongId from jcc_school_info where school_id = #{schoolId}

select jst.course_id, jst.user_id, jst.user_name, jst.course_name, jst.begin_date, jst.duration, jsi.school_id, jsi.school_name, jst.grade, jst.class_id, jci.class_name, jst.subject, jst.term, jst.week, jst.classroom_id, jst.section, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct jtrs.school_id) schoolIds, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct jtrc.class_id) classIds from jcc_school_timetable jst LEFT JOIN jcc_timetable_relate_school jtrs on jst.course_id = jtrs.course_id LEFT JOIN jcc_school_info jsi on jsi.school_id = jtrs.school_id LEFT JOIN jcc_timetable_relate_class jtrc on jtrc.course_id = jst.course_id LEFT JOIN jcc_class_info jci on jci.class_id = jtrc.class_id WHERE jst.course_id = #{courseId} GROUP BY jst.course_id

province_dept_id or city_dept_id or country_dept_id or dept_id in (#{deptId})
